This page exists for easy comparison of the basic attributes of base, specialty, artifact, unique, quest, Ancient Nord, Forsworn, Falmer, and Creation Club weapons the player can normally use. For additional general weapon information, see the base weapons page. To compare arrows and bolts, see Ammunition. For information regarding enchantments, tempering, and leveled versions, click a weapon name to view the corresponding page.

One-handed Weapons[edit]

Swords[edit]

  • Reach: 1 (1.05 for Torment)
  • Speed: 1
  • Stagger: 0.75 (0.85 for Stalhrim Sword)
